   Home/Politics/Fake tweet depicts Sambit Patra comparing PM Modi with
   Turkish warrior Ertugrul
   17th July 2020 / 6:30 pm / Last updated: 17th July 202017th July 2020

Fake tweet depicts Sambit Patra comparing PM Modi with Turkish warrior Ertugrul

   AvatarAvatarby Archit
     * Share
     * Tweet
     * Pin it
     * Share
     * Email
     * More

   A screenshot of BJP national spokesperson Sambit Patra’s alleged tweet is
   being circulated on social media.

As per the screenshot, Patra tweeted on
   May 16, “I am watching Ertugrul nowadays & I see narendra modi has similar
   leadership qualities as Ertugrul .His Strong belief in God, his Courage to
   not give up, His conviction to Stand on his principles even when everyone
   is against him.

Several Pakistan-based Twitter users shared the alleged screenshot of
   Patra’s tweet including @Nomii394 (archive link) and an anonymous account
   Pakistan Strategic Forum (archive link).

Hence, the tweet where BJP spokesperson Sambit Patra is depicted comparing
   PM Modi with Ertuğrul is manufactured.
